sn22.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye.
sn22.1:1.3: Atha kho nakulapita gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho nakulapita gahapati bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.1:2.1: “Ahamasmi, bhante, jinno vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto aturakayo abhikkhanatanko.
sn22.1:2.2: Aniccadassavi kho panaham, bhante, bhagavato manobhavaniyananca bhikkhunam.
sn22.1:3.2: Aturo hayam, gahapati, kayo andabhuto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:3.3: Yo hi, gahapati, imam kayam pariharanto muhuttampi arogyam patijaneyya, kimannatra balya?
sn22.1:4.1: Atha kho nakulapita gahapati bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho nakulapitaram gahapatim ayasma sariputto etadavoca:
sn22.1:4.4: Alattha no ajja bhagavato sammukha dhammim katham savanaya”ti?
sn22.1:5.2: Idanaham, bhante, bhagavata dhammiya kathaya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:5.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, gahapati, bhagavata dhammiya kathaya amatena abhisitto”ti?
sn22.1:5.4: “Idhaham, bhante, yena bhagava tenupasankamim; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidim. Ekamantam nisinno khvaham, bhante, bhagavantam etadavocam:
sn22.1:5.5: ‘ahamasmi, bhante, jinno vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto aturakayo abhikkhanatanko.
sn22.1:5.6: Aniccadassavi kho panaham, bhante, bhagavato manobhavaniyananca bhikkhunam.
sn22.1:6.1: Evam vutte, mam, bhante, bhagava etadavoca:
sn22.1:6.3: Aturo hayam, gahapati, kayo andabhuto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:6.4: Yo hi, gahapati, imam kayam pariharanto muhuttampi arogyam patijaneyya, kimannatra balya?
sn22.1:6.6: aturakayassa me sato cittam anaturam bhavissatiti.
sn22.1:6.8: Evam khvaham, bhante, bhagavata dhammiya kathaya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:7.1: “Na hi pana tam, gahapati, patibhasi bhagavantam uttarim patipucchitum:
sn22.1:7.2: ‘kittavata nu kho, bhante, aturakayo ceva hoti aturacitto ca, kittavata ca pana aturakayo hi kho hoti no ca aturacitto’”ti?
sn22.1:7.3: “Duratopi kho mayam, bhante, agaccheyyama ayasmato sariputtassa santike etassa bhasitassa atthamannatum.
sn22.1:7.4: Sadhu vatayasmantamyeva sariputtam patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho”ti.
sn22.1:8.1: “Tena hi, gahapati, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
sn22.1:8.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho nakulapita gahapati ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosi.
sn22.1:9.1: “Kathanca, gahapati, aturakayo ceva hoti, aturacitto ca?
sn22.1:9.2: Idha, gahapati, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
sn22.1:9.3: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam; attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
sn22.1:9.5: Tassa ‘aham rupam, mama rupan’ti pariyutthatthayino tam rupam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:10.1: Vedanam attato samanupassati, vedanavantam va attanam; attani va vedanam, vedanaya va attanam.
sn22.1:10.3: Tassa ‘aham vedana, mama vedana’ti pariyutthatthayino, sa vedana viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:11.1: Sannam attato samanupassati, sannavantam va attanam; attani va sannam, sannaya va attanam.
sn22.1:11.3: Tassa ‘aham sanna, mama sanna’ti pariyutthatthayino, sa sanna viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:12.1: Sankhare attato samanupassati, sankharavantam va attanam; attani va sankhare, sankharesu va attanam.
sn22.1:12.3: Tassa ‘aham sankhara, mama sankhara’ti pariyutthatthayino, te sankhara viparinamanti annatha honti.
sn22.1:13.1: Vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam; attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn22.1:13.3: Tassa ‘aham vinnanam, mama vinnanan’ti pariyutthatthayino, tam vinnanam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:13.5: Evam kho, gahapati, aturakayo ceva hoti aturacitto ca.
sn22.1:14.1: Kathanca, gahapati, aturakayo hi kho hoti no ca aturacitto?
sn22.1:14.2: Idha, gahapati, sutava ariyasavako ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito
sn22.1:14.3: na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam; na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam.
sn22.1:14.4: ‘Aham rupam, mama rupan’ti na pariyutthatthayi hoti.
sn22.1:14.5: Tassa ‘aham rupam, mama rupan’ti apariyutthatthayino, tam rupam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:15.1: Na vedanam attato samanupassati, na vedanavantam va attanam; na attani va vedanam, na vedanaya va attanam.
sn22.1:15.2: ‘Aham vedana, mama vedana’ti na pariyutthatthayi hoti.
sn22.1:15.3: Tassa ‘aham vedana, mama vedana’ti apariyutthatthayino, sa vedana viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:16.1: Na sannam attato samanupassati, na sannavantam va attanam; na attani va sannam, na sannaya va attanam.
sn22.1:16.2: ‘Aham sanna, mama sanna’ti na pariyutthatthayi hoti.
sn22.1:16.3: Tassa ‘aham sanna, mama sanna’ti apariyutthatthayino, sa sanna viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:17.1: Na sankhare attato samanupassati, na sankharavantam va attanam; na attani va sankhare, na sankharesu va attanam.
sn22.1:17.2: ‘Aham sankhara, mama sankhara’ti na pariyutthatthayi hoti.
sn22.1:17.3: Tassa ‘aham sankhara, mama sankhara’ti apariyutthatthayino, te sankhara viparinamanti annatha honti.
sn22.1:18.1: Na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam; na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn22.1:18.2: ‘Aham vinnanam, mama vinnanan’ti na pariyutthatthayi hoti.
sn22.1:18.3: Tassa ‘aham vinnanam, mama vinnanan’ti apariyutthatthayino, tam vinnanam viparinamati annatha hoti.
sn22.1:18.5: Evam kho, gahapati, aturakayo hoti no ca aturacitto”ti.
sn22.1:19.2: Attamano nakulapita gahapati ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinanditi.
